Sending email with fewer steps

I have the habit of sending email to the same inbox. These emails contain copied text, url, photos or sometimes reminders.

But each time, I have to retype my email address and set the subject. These tasks aren’t difficult. They are just unnecessary.

Last summer, YL  created his first iOS app to learn iOS programming. We didn’t expect it to make it to app store.

Today,  you can download it on here.

The To-myself icon is made by Awesome Vanessa Yeo.
